title: Notched Nike font
content:
Apologies in advance for the low quality photo, but I'm looking for a font similar to that in the attached photo. I specifically am searching for something with the notches cut out of the letters. Would be great if the original could be identified, but if not, something close will be just as helpful.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [notched.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/typophile.com/files/notched.png) | 18.17 KB |
author: elias_stein

comments.content: Sorry, don't know any font that could fit your needs as it. I'm pretty convinced (almost positive when it comes of Nike) it is a custom job. You best chance is probably to create your own, starting with a [College](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Acollege)/ [Athletic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aathletic)/ [Varsity](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Avarsity/)/ [Octagonal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aoctagonal/fonts/) Sans of your choice and customize it. Nike was also well-know for using [United HI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection) which I think could be a nice to start your customization on. [Some more](http://web.archive.org/web/20131119122605/http:/typophile.com/node/105488#comment-562631) in the same vein of United HI.
